column1: Nutritional values per ½ Deluxe Tub

> 🌿 **Vegan Option**
Replace the cottage cheese with 100g tofu, > and use soy protein isolate instead of the whey. FroYo spin, mix-in with crushed cantuccini, and topped with almonds. Very dense and non-melty, no ice crystals whatsoever. With brandy added: ice-free soft-serve after Light Ice Cream spin, scrape down, and a Respin.

Rating: 😋😋🍌🍌🍦

> *2025-06-18: Served with a cocoa powder sprinkle and almond slivers. Made with soy milk, spun on* Lite Ice Cream *and a re-mix. The last picture is scooping texture after 2 days in the freezer.*
> 
> Still rated 😋😋🍌🍌🍦

1. Blend the bananas, cottage cheese and the other ‘prep’ ingredients in an empty tub to a soft puree.
 1. Add "wet" ingredients to the banana puree.

column2:

0.5g tara gum (E417), 0.15g xanthan (E415),
14.3g inulin, 0.5g salt.
